projects.title: City of Angels
projects.description:
The most technically challenging show I'd ever worked on, with nearly 200 cues, 130 lanterns, and all the possible dimmer channels.

Samuel Pepys Theatre for SPS
projects.long_description:
The most technically challenging show I'd ever worked on, with nearly 200 cues, 130 lanterns, and all the possible dimmer channels. I rigged the majority of the lanterns myself, erected 9 extra lighting bars, and ran 300 metres of TRS and Socapex.

I also wrote an in-depth blog post describing my design process and some of the more technical details of the show.
